column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=How do you raise your children ?
#Text=I tortured myself about this before I had kids , and now that I have them , there a couple of things that make it very difficult for me to choose any one particular religion .
#Text=I ca n't forgive Catholicism for the kind of pederasty that it allowed .

#Text=It 's hard for me -- Jewish -- I can't -- I do n't even know , I 'm afraid to publish that , but -- I ca n't , you know , abide a religion that would distinguish a child from its parents , to say this child is n't part of this religion because its mother is n't .
#Text=To me , that 's exactly the kind of distinction that makes religion sinister and destructive .
#Text=How do you circumvent that in the rearing of children , then ?
#Text=I 'm thinking of something like a Unitarian .
#Text=I would do a Gnostic church if they really existed .
#Text=And I know they sort of exist , but they seem a little small .
#Text=I think Unitarian is probably as close as I 'm going to come .
#Text=Why would you be afraid to have it published that you 're part Jewish ?
#Text=First of all , I 'm tired of being Jewish .

#Text=I 'm tired of the fact that I 'm counted among Jewish people ; when I 'm at a funeral , and there have been a lot of funerals on that side of the family , they 're perfectly happy to have me carry a casket .
#Text=But you know , I 'm not part of the Promised Land , and I 'm tired of the selective tally .
#Text=Also , people say that Judaism is a philosophy , and then it comes up : " Are your kids Jewish ?

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=I say ,  No " ; to me , that makes it a religion , you know ?

column1: #Text=I 'm getting baptized in the next few months , because the Gnostic principle --
#Text=[ chuckles ] As a big " Fuck you " to Judaism , or -- ?
#Text=Partly , but I appreciate Gnostic principle of -- the Gospel of Thomas is meaningful to me .
#Text=I like it .
#Text=So you 're going to be baptized into the Gnostic church ?
#Text=Well , this is the other thing .
#Text=I 've got to decide exactly how to do it .
#Text=Baptism is looked at in different ways contingent on what Christian group we 're talking about .
#Text=Some think it 's okay to baptize children .
#Text=Others think it 's part of a later conversion in life .

#Text=For me , the ones that think it 's okay to baptize children , that 's precisely what I do n't want , because the idea that a child would n't be accepted , blessed by God regardless , whether or not they 've been baptized -- to say that God would have anything against any child is just disgusting to me .
#Text=I ca n't forgive it .
